channel.title: Installing Monero connection error
channel.description:
I dl'd and verified monero then decompressed it and got an error when I tried to start it. On IRC they suggested i start using: That did start the gui. I was able to create a wallet but then got the error qml: >>> wallet refreshed Checking connection status qml: >>> wallet updated refreshed qml: >>> wallet refreshed Checking connection status qml: >>> wallet updated refreshed qml: >>> wallet refreshed Checking connection status qml: >>> wallet updated sending external cmd: ("status") "Error: Couldn't connect to daemon: 127.0.0.1:18081\n"
On IRC torsocks was suggested but I got an error trying to use that as well. Has anyone had moero give errors regarding connecting to the daemon?

item.title: Installing Monero connection error
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Did you set up Stream Isolation with Monero?

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Installing Monero connection error
item.dc:creator: jbwihokkc
item.description:
I dl’d and verified monero then decompressed it and got an error when I tried to start it. On IRC they suggested i start using:
That did start the gui.
I was able to create a wallet but then got the error
qml: >>> wallet refreshed
Checking connection status
qml: >>> wallet updated
refreshed
qml: >>> wallet refreshed
Checking connection status
qml: >>> wallet updated
refreshed
qml: >>> wallet refreshed
Checking connection status
qml: >>> wallet updated
sending external cmd: (“status”)
“Error: Couldn’t connect to daemon: 127.0.0.1:18081\n”

On IRC torsocks was suggested but I got an error trying to use that as well.
Has anyone had moero give errors regarding connecting to the daemon?

Read full topic
